name: Epic Birthday run because you're fucking late and you found no gift ! Hurry up! Xavier ultimate ninja platinum edition
name_original: Epic Birthday run because you're fucking late and you found no gift ! Hurry up! Xavier ultimate ninja platinum edition
description:
I started this game about 1 year and few month ago for the birth of the first child of one of my best friend. But I never sent it because I saw the baby comes and I didn't finish the game so I dropped it. But about one month ago The Space Unicorn On Fire band (who gave me the autorisation to use one of their song for the game) asked me if it was finish and if they can play it. I was ashamed and I decided to finish it for the first birthday of my friend's child !

I worked hard and here it is, my first game released ! I hope you like it, personally I do, but more important I hope my friend and his wife like it (and the baby too, you never know !)

Special thanks to Space Unicorn On Fire for allowing me to use their song ! Check out their album, it's really great !

FAQ :

Why this game name?

Because my friend and I love stupid long title.

What is the game engine?

The game is made in unity.

How many time did you spend on the game?

when you love you don't count, but I would say about 100-150 hours
